experience.description:
As lead front-end developer, some roles I've played were:
- Be part of the architecture team, to continuously define/review the front-end technology stack
- Together with UX designers, define and build a design system to be used as base for all projects
- Build/maintain a variety of SPAs from dashboards fed by IOT devices to a reward program app based in blockchain

Using the MEAN stack, remotely worked in very innovative mobile-first SPAs, including:
- A smart booking system for medical appointments
- A platform to join tourists and professional guides

Worked as lead developer of a data visualization web application made with AngularJS and Spring Framework. Some of my responsibilities were:
- Create new interactive visualizations using D3.js.
- Develop data analysis algorithms targeting the telecom industry
- Integrate new platforms (such as Apache Spark)
Full web solution for registering at the congress including institutional website, paper submission and payment. Made with Vanilla JS and PHP.
